descriptor.name: Exquisite Handcrafted Clay Bowl for Household Items, Artisanal Tableware & Decorative Showpiece, 6 Inches Wide, Perfect for Dry Foods & Storage, Eco-Friendly & Non-Toxic
descriptor.short_desc:
Artisanal Elegance: Each bowl is a testament to the artisan's skill, hand-carved from premium clay and meticulously colored with a brush, making it a unique addition to your home or as a thoughtful gift.
Versatile Use: Perfect for serving dry snacks to guests or as a charming storage solution for household items. Its 6-inch width and 2-inch depth make it ideal for various uses, from tableware to decorative showpiece.
Eco-Friendly and Safe: Crafted with care and without the use of harmful chemicals, our clay bowls are not only safe for you and your family but also contribute to a healthier planet.
Durable and Easy to Maintain: Despite its delicate appearance, the bowl is solid and durable. It is easy to clean with just soap and water, ensuring its beauty and functionality are preserved over time.
Securely Packed & Priced Right: At just Rs. 160 per bowl, we ensure each piece is securely packed for shipping, making it an affordable luxury or gift that arrives in perfect condition.
descriptor.long_desc: Discover the perfect blend of functionality and artistry with our Handcrafted Clay Bowl, meticulously designed for your home. Each bowl, spanning 6 inches in width and 2 inches in depth, is a masterpiece carved by skilled artisans from the finest clay. The intricate hand-carving and delicate brush coloring process imbue each piece with a unique charm, making it not just a bowl, but a piece of art. Ideal for serving dry foods like bhajiya and bhujiya or for storing household items, this versatile bowl adds elegance to any setting. Its solid construction ensures durability, while the absence of chemicals guarantees safety for you and your loved ones. Although not suitable for microwave use, this bowl is easy to clean with just soap and water, ensuring its beauty and functionality for years to come. Priced at Rs. 160, each bowl is securely packed for shipping, promising not only a product but an experience. Embrace the beauty of handcrafted perfection for your home, tableware collection, or as a unique gift.

descriptor.name: Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray - 500ml | 80% Alcohol Volume for Effective Germ Kill | Long-Lasting Protection in Polluted Environments | Compact and Efficient | Manufactured by Be Sanitized, China
descriptor.short_desc:
Contains 80% alcohol by volume, ensuring a superior level of germ protection. The high alcohol content makes it highly effective against a wide range of pathogens, providing you with peace of mind in various environments.
Innovative mist spray dispenser design for economical use. This feature not only makes the sanitizer last longer but also ensures a more even application over the hands, maximizing coverage and effectiveness.
Long-lasting 3-year shelf life, perfect for long-term use. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on the go, this sanitizer will remain effective, keeping you protected from germs and pollution.
Manufactured by Be Sanitized in China with dimensions of 3 cm x 10 cm x 50 mm and weighing 250 grams, making it both lightweight and portable. Its compact size allows for easy storage in bags, purses, or cars for sanitization anywhere, anytime.
Special offer: Purchase directly from us for Rs 250, a saving of Rs 50 compared to other retailers. Limited stock available with a maximum of 3 units per customer, ensuring fair access to this essential product.
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing the Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray, your ultimate partner in maintaining hand hygiene effortlessly. This meticulously designed half-liter bottle contains a powerful 80% alcohol by volume formula, ensuring a high level of protection against germs and viruses. The innovative mist dispenser design not only facilitates easy application but also significantly extends the product's usage, making it a cost-effective solution for daily sanitization needs. With a generous shelf life of 3 years, this sanitizer promises to keep your hands clean, even in the most polluted environments. Manufactured with precision by Be Sanitized in China, this product boasts dimensions that make it both portable and easy to use. Despite its international origins, we offer this premium sanitizer at a competitive price of Rs 250, exclusively for our customers. Stock is limited to 50 units, with a maximum purchase limit of 3 units per customer, ensuring fair access to all. Produced in January 2024 and imported in February 2024, this product adheres to the highest standards of quality and safety. For added peace of mind, we offer a 2-day return policy and a 5-hour cancellation window after order placement. Embrace the Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray for a safer, cleaner, and happier tomorrow.

descriptor.name: Bowl
descriptor.short_desc: Handcrafted Elegance: Each bowl is a unique masterpiece, hand-carved and colored by skilled artisans, ensuring no two pieces are exactly alike. Its 6-inch width and 2-inch depth make it versatile for various uses.Versatile & Functional: Perfect for serving dry snacks to guests or storing small household items. Its elegant design also makes it an ideal choice for a decorative showpiece, adding a touch of beauty to any room.Eco-Friendly & Safe: Made from natural clay and free from harmful chemicals, this bowl is an eco-conscious addition to your home. Its solid construction ensures durability and long-lasting use.Easy to Clean & Maintain: Despite its delicate appearance, the bowl is designed for easy care. Simply wash with water and soap. Note: It is not dishwasher safe or microwave proof.Securely Packed & Priced Right: Each bowl is carefully packed to ensure it reaches you in perfect condition. Priced at Rs. 160, it offers exceptional value for a piece of artisan craftsmanship.
descriptor.long_desc: Discover the perfect blend of functionality and artistry with our Hand-Carved Clay Bowl, meticulously crafted by skilled artisans. Each bowl, standing at 6 inches wide and 2 inches deep, is a testament to the timeless beauty of handcrafted pottery. Made from high-quality clay, this bowl undergoes a detailed hand-carving process followed by a delicate coloring with brushes, ensuring every piece is unique. Ideal for serving dry foods like bhajiya and bhujiya or for storing household items, it adds a touch of elegance to any setting. While it's not suitable for microwave use, cleaning is a breeze with just water and soap. Its solid, chemical-free construction makes it a safe, eco-friendly choice for your home. Use it as a functional piece for serving guests or as a stunning showpiece to enhance your decor. Priced affordably, each bowl is securely packed for shipping, ensuring it arrives at your doorstep ready to beautify your home or serve as a thoughtful gift.

descriptor.name: Premium Black and Green Backpack Bag with Laptop Sleeve - Lightweight and Durable
descriptor.short_desc:
Sleek black and green design with two main compartments and accessory pocket
Padded laptop sleeve for secure transport of your device
Comfortable padded back strap for all-day wear
Lightweight and durable construction, perfect for work, school, or travel
Made by Best Bags in America with special care instructions for long-lasting use
descriptor.long_desc: Upgrade your daily carry with our premium backpack bag in sleek black and green design. Featuring two main compartments, an accessory pocket, and padded laptop sleeve, this bag offers both style and functionality. The specially padded back strap ensures comfort even with heavy loads. Made by Best Bags in America, this bag is perfect for work, school, or travel.
